function.name: get_joint_diagnosis
function.description: DKDB: Get joint diagnosis for one or more message codes

message_codes.description:
List of message codes. If messages are associated with motors, ESCs, pumps or nozzles then message codes must be indexed and cannot have placeholders. Examples:
* Correct: ['error_pump_1_stuck', 'error_esc_4_throttle']
* Incorrect: ['error_pump_{PUMP}_stuck', 'error_esc_{MOTOR}_stuck']
